Articles.Content:
Hi!

Ok, this is so far from KSP you can get, I guess, but this is the only forum I'm active in, so I'll give it a go.

I need a case/screenprotector for my Samsung Galaxy S4 (GT-i9505) that will protect my screen from rain. Not submerging or anything fancy like that, I just want it to be able to withstand a few drops if I have to use it when it's raining

Don't know if this is against the rules, or if this is too off-topic for the forums. Excuse me if so, and please close the thread.

Thanks for your answers!

This thread is fine in the Space Lounge Vespasianus, don't worry

I am unable to make any suggestions though, I hope someone here can help you.

Hi!

Ok, this is so far from KSP you can get, I guess, but this is the only forum I'm active in, so I'll give it a go.

I think not many companies make one becuase of that version of the phone that's already waterproof... but I did find you this,

http://store.androidcommunity.com/krusell-sealabox-waterproof-case/4A104A13551.htm

Maybe there's an app for it?

Probably
